# library(deltaq)


## Overview

The **deltaq** package provides access to 7-day quarantine breach rate data [@zachreson2022] simulated for Australia and its states/territories, covering **27 Oct 2020 â€“ 31 Jul 2021**.

## Launch the interactive app 

The DeltaQ: Breach Data Explorer app provides an interactive dashboard for exploring 7-day quarantine breach rates across Australian jurisdictions.

The app automatically updates visualisations when inputs change, allowing real-time comparison of jurisdictions and trends. It is launched directly from R using:


**deltaq::launch_app()**


This opens the Shiny interface locally in your web browser.
